name: Mushroom Vacuum
description:
Your room has been infested with mushrooms! Thankfully you have the brand new mushroom-cleaning robot ARMS that will help you with the cleaning.

The robot will continuously scan for mushrooms for cleanup. Upon absorbing some of the intruders, it will ask you to make sure that it counted them properly (for analytics).

Your task is to supervise the robot by either agreeing with it or correcting it - simply select how much its answer differs from reality.

The game is a spin on the jam's theme (Make it Count) because it's not interpreted here as making good use of scarce resources, but rather as an order to force something else to do the counting 👉😏👉

The game requires ARCore supported device to run.
